19.parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
19.str2: Himself, herself, itself.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

19.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
19.str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

19.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
19.str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A falling away, lapse, slip, false step, trespass, sin. From parapipto; a side-slip, i.e. error or transgression.

19.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
19.str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

19.parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
19.str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

19.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
19.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
Reconciliation, restoration to favor. From katallasso; exchange, i.e. Restoration to favor.

20.str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

20.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
20.str2: To be aged, act as an ambassador. From the base of presbuteros; to be a senior, i.e. act as a representative.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

20.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
20.str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

20.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
20.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

20.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
20.str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

20.str2: To change, exchange, reconcile. From kata and allasso; to change mutually, i.e. to compound a difference.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

21.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
21.str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

21.parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
21.str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

21.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
21.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

21.str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

21.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

21.parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Plural
21.str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
